title: Living tomorrow. No. 127
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: An entirely new concept in Aviaries provides tropical birds in the north of England with the right environment; carbon dioxide is used to isolate fault sections in a water supply system needing repair - also see a simple way to prevent pipes that may freeze in the winter from bursting; a new artificial leg which automatically telescopes at the knee helps the user to walk naturally.
